data.name: NotEmptyValidator
data.value: '{PropertyName}' is required.

data.value: New password cannot be the same as the old password.

data.value: User must be at least 5 years old.

data.name: MinimumLengthValidator
data.value: '{PropertyName}' must be at least {MinLength} characters long.

data.name: PasswordUppercaseValidator
data.value: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.

data.name: PasswordLowercaseValidator
data.value: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.

data.name: PasswordDigitValidator
data.value: Password must contain at least one digit.

data.name: PasswordNonAlphanumericValidator
data.value: Password must contain at least one non-alphanumeric character.
